title: GT’s Friend Ship BMX invites young rippers to cruise into a universe of fun
content:
All aboard the Friend Ship, it’s time for an adventure! Some creative minds at GT Bicycles decided to not only build an affordable BMX for young riders, but to create a universe of characters and a storyline to go with it. The Friend Ship BMX aims to spark youths’ imagination and inspire them to ride […]

The post GT’s Friend Ship BMX invites young rippers to cruise into a universe of fun appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
